title: Krishi Setu
description: A platform to explore agricultural schemes and resources for Indian farmers.
helpline_kisan_desc: Toll-free number for farmer queries on agricultural practices and schemes.
helpline_ministry_desc: Contact for general agricultural assistance from the Ministry.
category_agricultural_marketing_and_valu: Agricultural Marketing and Value Chain Development
select_regions: Please select a region to view crops.
soil_needs_desc: Information on soil types, nutrient requirements, and testing methods.
irrigation_practices_desc: Details on drip irrigation, sprinkler systems, and water management.
seeds_desc: Guide to selecting high-quality seeds and seed treatment techniques.
finance_desc: Information on agricultural loans, subsidies, and financial planning.
pest_control_desc: Methods for managing pests and diseases in crops.
fertilizers_desc: Types of fertilizers and their application techniques.
crop_rotation_desc: Benefits and strategies for rotating crops.
harvesting_techniques_desc: Best practices for harvesting and post-harvest management.
livestock_management_desc: Care and management of livestock in farming.
market_trends_desc: Latest trends and tips for selling agricultural produce.
